namespace = POP_MassBuilding
province_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.001
	title = POP_MassBuilding.001.t
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.001.d
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = no
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		has_building = upgrade_roads_build
		NOT = {
			has_province_modifier = road_is_building
		}
		NOT = {
			has_province_flag = mass_building_road
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = upgrade_roads_build
					NOT = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_building
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mass_build_ducat_cost
								value = 2000000
							}
						}
					}
					owner = {
						set_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
					}
				}
				else = {
					remove_building = upgrade_roads_build
					set_province_flag = already_started_building_road
					set_province_flag = mass_building_road
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								owner = {
									dip_tech = 4
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = paved_road_network
										has_building = highway_network
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = road_network
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = road_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 80
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = urban_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 2
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = rural_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0.01
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							which = prov_radius
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 2.5
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_price_multiplier
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = road_price_total_mult
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = road_network
								owner = {
									dip_tech = 13
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = highway_network
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = paved_road_network
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = road_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 120
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = urban_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 2
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = rural_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0.01
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							which = prov_radius
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 2.5
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_price_multiplier
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = road_price_total_mult
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = paved_road_network
								owner = {
									dip_tech = 33
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = highway_network
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = road_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 180
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = urban_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 2
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = rural_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0.01
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							which = prov_radius
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 2.5
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_price_multiplier
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = road_price_total_mult
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = highway_network
								owner = {
									dip_tech = 50
								}
								AND = {
									always = yes
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = road_and_rail_network
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = road_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 250
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = urban_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 2
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							which = rural_pop
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0.01
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							which = prov_radius
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 2.5
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_price_multiplier
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = road_price_total_mult
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_total_mult
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_price_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = road_province_size_multiplier
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						which = building_cost
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = building_cost
						value = 0
					}
					owner = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
							which = PREV
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				owner = {
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_building = upgrade_roads_build
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									check_variable = {
										which = mass_build_ducat_cost
										value = 2000000
									}
								}
							}
							owner = {
								set_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
							}
						}
						else = {
							remove_building = upgrade_roads_build
							set_province_flag = already_started_building_road
							set_province_flag = mass_building_road
							if = {
								limit = {
									AND = {
										owner = {
											dip_tech = 4
										}
										AND = {
											NOT = {
												has_building = paved_road_network
												has_building = highway_network
												has_building = road_and_rail_network
											}
										}
										NOT = {
											has_building = road_network
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = road_is_building
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = "building_cost"
									value = 80
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 0
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									which = urban_pop
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 2
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									which = rural_pop
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 0.01
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									which = prov_radius
								}
								divide_variable = {
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									value = 2.5
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									value = 1
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_price_multiplier
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_terrain_cost
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									which = road_price_total_mult
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 0.001
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 1000
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									value = 0
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									AND = {
										has_building = road_network
										owner = {

										}
										AND = {
											NOT = {

											}
										}

										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = road_is_building

									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 0

								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 2
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									which = rural_pop
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = road_price_multiplier
									value = 0.01
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									value = 0
								}

									which = prov_radius

									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									value = 2.5
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									value = 1
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_price_multiplier
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_terrain_cost
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult

								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									which = road_price_total_mult
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost

									which = building_cost
									value = 1000

									which = road_price_total_mult
									value = 0

									value = 0

								}

									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_terrain_cost
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									which = road_province_size_multiplier

								multiply_variable = {

										owner = {

										}
										AND = {
											always = yes
										}

										NOT = {

									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {

									which = prov_radius

									value = 2.5
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_price_total_mult
									value = 1

									which = road_price_multiplier

									value = 0
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = road_province_size_multiplier
									value = 0

							}

								value = 0

								which = mass_build_ducat_cost
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_cash_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
							value = 0.05
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
							value = 0.25
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
							value = 0.05
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
							value = 0.50
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
							value = 0.05
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
							value = 0.75
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
							which = upper_pop
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
							value = 1
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							value = 0.01
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
							which = upper_pop
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
							value = 1
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							value = 0.03
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
							value = -1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
							which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
							value = -1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
							value = 50
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
							which = upper_pop
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
							value = 1
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							value = 0.01
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = adm_power
							value = trigger_value:adm_power
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = adm_power
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_current
							which = adm_power
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
							which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
							which = estate_burghers_treasury
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
							which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = dip_power
							value = trigger_value:dip_power
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = dip_power
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_current
							which = dip_power
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
							which = mass_build_diplo_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
							}
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_current
							value = manpower
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = mil_power
							value = trigger_value:mil_power
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = mil_power
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_current
							which = mil_power
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
							which = mass_build_milit_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							value = -1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							value = -1
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
							which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
							which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
							which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_cost
							which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_cost
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_cash_percentage
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_cash_percentage
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_percentage
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_percentage
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_percentage
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_percentage
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
							value = 100
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = POP_MassBuilding.0021
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_dev_button_interactions.001.a"
		trigger = {}
		hidden_effect = {}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.0021
	title = POP_MassBuilding.002.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.002.desc
	picture = ROAD_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_desc
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_desc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power

				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0022
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.c"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost

				multiply_variable = {

				}
				set_variable = {

		}

					value = 1

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost

					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

						}
					}

					}
				}

				}

					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}

							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {

						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0022
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.f"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power

				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}

						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

					}

				}

				}

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.g"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {

				}
			}
		}

			set_variable = {

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share

					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}

					which = mass_build_estate_treasury

				}

				}

				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}

					value = 1
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_current

					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

					value = 1

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio

				}

				}

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0022

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0022
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.i"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_cost

					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}

					value = 1000
				}

					which = adm_power

				}

					value = 1

					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				}

					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				}

						}
					}

					}
				}

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

					}
				}
				set_variable = {

				multiply_variable = {

				}

				}
				set_variable = {
