				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

					}

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}

					set_variable = {

					}

					}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0022
			}
		}

					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {

						}
					}

			}

			}

				which = mass_build_admin_percentage
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_cash_percentage
				value = 0

				value = 0

				value = 0

				value = 0

				value = 0

				which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				value = 0

			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				value = 0
			}

				which = ducat_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = {
							has_building = upgrade_roads_build
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = road_is_building
							}
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = mass_building_road
							}
						}
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
			}
		}
		highlight = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.z"
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = mass_building_road
				}
				clr_province_flag = mass_building_road
				clr_province_flag = already_started_building_road
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_current
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				value = 0
			}

				value = 0

}
country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.0022
	title = POP_MassBuilding.002.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.002.desc
	picture = ROAD_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_desc
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_desc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0021
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.b"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio

					}

					}

					}

				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio

				set_variable = {

				change_variable = {

					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.c"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {

					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure

				}
			}
		}

			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure

					value = 0

					value = 0

					value = 0

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted

					value = 0

					value = 0
				}

					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost

					value = 0.01
				}

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}

					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {

				}

				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}

					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {

					which = dip_power
				}

					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}

						}

					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

				}

					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0021
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.e"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost

				}

					value = 0.05
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1

					value = 1000
				}

					which = adm_power

					}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.f"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_cost

					value = 0.05

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost

					which = upper_pop
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost

					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}

					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current

				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

					}
				}
				set_variable = {

				}

				}

					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

					}

					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0021
			}
		}

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.g"

			NOT = {

					}

						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {

				}

					value = 1

				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0021
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.i"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power

				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {

						}
					}

					}
				}
				set_variable = {

					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

				}

				}

					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1

					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				set_variable = {

							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury

				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power

				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}

					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}

					value = 1

				if = {

							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}

				}

					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}

				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio

					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage

					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0021

		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.l"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {

				value = 0.001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}

				}

					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}

				}

					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				}

					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				}
				set_variable = {

				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

					}
				}

				}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.y"
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_option
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = ducat_cost
				which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = admin_cost
				which = mass_build_admin_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				which = mass_build_diplo_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				which = mass_build_milit_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				which = mass_build_manpower_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				which = mass_build_estate_cost
			}
			divide_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				which = mass_build_estate_treasury
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				value = -1
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				value = 1
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_burghers_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			while = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 65536
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -65536
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 65536
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 32768
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -32768
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 32768
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 16384
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -16384
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 16384
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 8192
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -8192
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 8192
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 4096
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -4096
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 4096
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 2048
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -2048
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 2048
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 1024
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -1024
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 1024
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 512
					}
				}

				which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ducat_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = {
							has_building = upgrade_roads_build
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = road_is_building
							}
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = mass_building_road
							}
						}
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = mass_build_more_road
			}
		}
		highlight = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.z"
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = mass_building_road
				}
				clr_province_flag = mass_building_road
				clr_province_flag = already_started_building_road
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_current
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_percentage
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_cash_percentage
				value = 0

			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				value = 0

				value = 0

province_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.003
	title = POP_MassBuilding.003.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.003.desc
	picture = ROAD_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = highway_network
				}
				set_province_flag = road_and_rail_network_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = road_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = paved_road_network
				}
				set_province_flag = highway_network_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = road_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = road_network
				}
				set_province_flag = paved_road_network_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = road_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_building = road_network
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = paved_road_network
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = highway_network
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = road_and_rail_network
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = road_network_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = road_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			province_event = {
				id = POP_dev_button_interactions.009
				days = 1825
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.003.a"
		hidden_effect = {}
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.004
	title = POP_MassBuilding.004.t
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.004.d
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = no
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		AND = {
			has_building = upgrade_fort_build
			NOT = {
				has_province_flag = mass_building_fort
			}
			NOT = {
				owner = {
					has_country_flag = mass_building
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = upgrade_fort_build
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mass_build_ducat_cost
								value = 2000000
							}
						}
					}
					owner = {
						set_country_flag = mass_build_more_fort
					}
				}
				else = {
					remove_building = upgrade_fort_build
					set_province_flag = mass_building_fort
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								owner = {
									mil_tech = 3
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_15th
										has_building = fort_16th
										has_building = fort_17th
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = fort_14th
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 80
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = tmpMult
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = fort_14th
								owner = {
									mil_tech = 15
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_16th
										has_building = fort_17th
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = fort_15th
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 120
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = tmpMult
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = fort_15th
								owner = {
									mil_tech = 26
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_17th
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = fort_16th
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 180
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = tmpMult
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = fort_16th
								owner = {
									mil_tech = 35
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = fort_17th
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 260
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = tmpMult
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = fort_17th
								owner = {
									mil_tech = 41
								}
								AND = {
									always = yes
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = fort_18th
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = "building_cost"
							value = 360
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							which = road_terrain_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 1

						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = tmpMult
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = tmpMult
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						which = building_cost
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = building_cost
						value = 0
					}
					owner = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
							which = PREV
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				owner = {

						limit = {
							has_building = upgrade_fort_build
						}

							limit = {

										value = 2000000
									}
								}
							}

							}
						}

							remove_building = upgrade_fort_build
							set_province_flag = mass_building_fort
							if = {
								limit = {
									AND = {
										owner = {
											mil_tech = 3
										}
										AND = {
											NOT = {
												has_building = fort_15th
												has_building = fort_16th
												has_building = fort_17th
												has_building = fort_18th
											}
										}
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_14th
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = "building_cost"
									value = 80
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = tmpMult
									which = road_terrain_cost
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = tmpMult
									value = 1
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									which = tmpMult
								}
								set_variable = {
