country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.0052
	title = POP_MassBuilding.005.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.005.desc
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_desc
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_fort
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_desc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0051
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.b"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.c"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure

					value = 0.05

					value = 0.25
				}

					value = 0.05

					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio

				}

					value = 0.05

					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1

					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio

					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage

					value = 100

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0051
			}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.e"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost

					value = 50

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.f"
		trigger = {

		}

			change_variable = {

				value = -1

				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}

					value = 0

					value = 0
				}

					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}

					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor

					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}

					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio

					}
				}

							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

					value = 0

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0051

					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio

				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

					}
					set_variable = {

							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {

					}

					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}

				}

					value = 0

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.h"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 0.001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost

					value = 50
				}

				}

					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor

				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio

					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.y"
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_fort
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_option
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = ducat_cost
				which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = admin_cost
				which = mass_build_admin_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				which = mass_build_diplo_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				which = mass_build_milit_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				which = mass_build_manpower_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				which = mass_build_estate_cost
			}
			divide_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				which = mass_build_estate_treasury
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				value = -1
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				value = 1
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_burghers_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			while = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 65536
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -65536
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 65536
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 32768
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -32768
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 32768
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 16384
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -16384
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 16384
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 8192
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -8192
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 8192
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 4096
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -4096
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 4096
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 2048
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -2048
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 2048
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 1024
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -1024
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 1024
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 512
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -512
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost

				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

						which = ducat_cost
						value = 256
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -256
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 256
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 128
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -128
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 128

			}
			if = {
				limit = {

						which = ducat_cost
						value = 64
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -64
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 64
				}
			}
			if = {

						value = 32
					}

				add_treasury = -32
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 32
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

						which = ducat_cost
						value = 16
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -16

					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = {

							}
						}
					}
				}

			}
		}
		highlight = yes
	}

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.z"
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = mass_building_fort
				}
				clr_province_flag = mass_building_fort
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_current
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 0

				which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
				value = 0

				which = mass_build_admin_percentage
				value = 0

			}

				which = milit_cost
				value = 0
			}

				which = manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_more
		}
		highlight = yes
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.006
	title = POP_MassBuilding.006.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.006.desc
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = fort_17th
				}
				set_province_flag = fort_18th_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = fort_is_building
					duration = 900
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = fort_16th
				}
				set_province_flag = fort_17th_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = fort_is_building
					duration = 900
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = fort_15th
				}
				set_province_flag = fort_16th_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = fort_is_building
					duration = 900
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = fort_14th
				}
				set_province_flag = fort_15th_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = fort_is_building
					duration = 900
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_building = fort_14th
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = fort_15th
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = fort_16th
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = fort_17th
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = fort_18th
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = fort_14th_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = fort_is_building
					duration = 900
				}
			}
			province_event = {
				id = POP_dev_button_interactions.109
				days = 900
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.006.a"
		hidden_effect = {}
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.007
	title = POP_MassBuilding.007.t
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.007.d
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = no
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		AND = {
			has_building = upgrade_canal_build
			NOT = {
				has_province_flag = mass_building_canal
			}
			NOT = {
				owner = {
					has_country_flag = mass_building
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = upgrade_canal_build
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mass_build_ducat_cost
								value = 2000000
							}
						}
					}
					owner = {
						set_country_flag = mass_build_more_canal
					}
				}
				else = {
					remove_building = upgrade_canal_build
					set_province_flag = mass_building_canal
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								owner = {
									adm_tech = 5
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_2
										has_building = canal_level_3
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = canal_level_1
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = innate_rural_pop_base
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 100
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 500
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = canal_level_1
								owner = {
									adm_tech = 16
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
								}
								AND = {
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_3
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = canal_level_2
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = innate_rural_pop_base
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 150
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 500
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							AND = {
								has_building = canal_level_2
								owner = {
									adm_tech = 40
								}
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
								}
								AND = {
									always = yes
								}
								NOT = {
									has_building = canal_level_3
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							which = innate_rural_pop_base
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 0.1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 200
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = building_cost
							value = 500
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						which = building_cost
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = building_cost
						value = 0
					}
					owner = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
							which = PREV
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						value = 0
					}
				}
				owner = {
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = {
							has_building = upgrade_canal_build
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								owner = {
									check_variable = {
										which = mass_build_ducat_cost
										value = 2000000
									}
								}
							}
							owner = {
								set_country_flag = mass_build_more_canal
							}
						}
						else = {
							remove_building = upgrade_canal_build
							set_province_flag = mass_building_canal
							if = {
								limit = {
									AND = {
										owner = {
											adm_tech = 5
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
										}
										AND = {
											NOT = {
												has_building = canal_level_2
												has_building = canal_level_3
											}
										}
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_1
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									which = innate_rural_pop_base
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 0.1
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 100
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 500
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									AND = {
										has_building = canal_level_1
										owner = {
											adm_tech = 16
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
										}
										AND = {
											NOT = {
												has_building = canal_level_3
											}
										}
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_2
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									which = innate_rural_pop_base
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 0.1
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 150
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 500
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									AND = {
										has_building = canal_level_2
										owner = {
											adm_tech = 40
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
										}
										AND = {
											always = yes
										}
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									which = innate_rural_pop_base
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 0.1
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 200
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = building_cost
									value = 500
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_ducat_cost
								which = building_cost
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = building_cost
								value = 0
							}
							owner = {
								change_variable = {
									which = mass_build_ducat_cost
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_ducat_cost
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					hidden_effect = {
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_cash_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
							value = 0.05
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
							value = 0.25
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
							value = 0.05
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
							value = 0.50
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
							value = 0.05
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
							value = 0.75
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
							which = upper_pop
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
							value = 1
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							value = 0.01
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
							which = upper_pop
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
							value = 1
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							value = 0.03
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
							value = -1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
							which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
							value = -1
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_diplo_mult
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
							value = 50
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
							which = upper_pop
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
							value = 1
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							value = 0.01
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
							value = 1000
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = adm_power
							value = trigger_value:adm_power
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = adm_power
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_current
							which = adm_power
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
							which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
							which = estate_burghers_treasury
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
							which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_treasury
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = dip_power
							value = trigger_value:dip_power
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = dip_power
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_current
							which = dip_power
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
							which = mass_build_diplo_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
							}
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_current
							value = manpower
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
						}
						export_to_variable = {
							which = mil_power
							value = trigger_value:mil_power
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = mil_power
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_current
							which = mil_power
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
							which = mass_build_milit_current
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							value = -1
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							value = -1
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
									which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
								which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
							which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
							which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
							which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_cost
							which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_cost
							which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_diplo_cost
							which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_cost
							which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_milit_cost
							which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
							which = mass_build_ducat_cost
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_cash_percentage
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_cash_percentage
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_percentage
							which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_percentage
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_percentage
							which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_percentage
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
							which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
							value = 100
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = POP_MassBuilding.0081
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_dev_button_interactions.001.a"
		trigger = {}
		hidden_effect = {}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.0081
	title = POP_MassBuilding.008.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.008.desc
	picture = FARMING_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_desc
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_canal
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_desc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

						}

					}

					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}

					which = mass_build_estate_treasury

				}
