				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0082
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.b"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = -1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

				}

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.c"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {

				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure

			}

					value = 1000
				}

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor

					value = 1000

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0082
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.e"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}

					which = dip_power

				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}

				}

					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}

				}

				}
				change_variable = {

					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}

					value = 1

				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost

					value = -1

					value = 0.01

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000

					value = 1

				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure

				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

				}
				multiply_variable = {

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost

					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}

					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio

					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage

					which = mass_build_estate_percentage

					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0082
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.h"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 0.001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}

					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.i"

			NOT = {

				}
			}
		}

			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {

				}

					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0

					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}

					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio

				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}

				}
				change_variable = {

					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.l"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				value = 0.001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure

					which = mass_build_admin_cost

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}

					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor

					value = 1000
				}

					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

					}
				}
				set_variable = {

				}
				change_variable = {

				}
				set_variable = {

				if = {

				change_variable = {

					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {

				}
				set_variable = {

					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0082
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.y"
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_canal
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_option
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_tooltip
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = ducat_cost
				which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = admin_cost
				which = mass_build_admin_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				which = mass_build_diplo_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				which = mass_build_milit_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				which = mass_build_manpower_cost
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				which = mass_build_estate_cost
			}
			divide_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				which = mass_build_estate_treasury
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				value = -1
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
				value = 1
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = estate_burghers_treasury
				which = mass_build_estate_new_ratio
			}
			while = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 65536
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -65536
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 65536
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 32768
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -32768
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 32768
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 16384
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -16384
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 16384
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 8192
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -8192
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 8192
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 4096
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -4096
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 4096
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 2048
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -2048
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 2048
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 1024
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -1024
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 1024
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 512
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -512
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 512
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 256
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -256
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 256
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 128
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -128
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost

				}
			}
			if = {

					}

			if = {

					}

				add_treasury = -16
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost

			if = {

						value = 8
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -8
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 8
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 4
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -4
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 4
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 2
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -2
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 2
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 1
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -1
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = ducat_cost
						value = 0.5
					}
				}
				add_treasury = -0.5
				subtract_variable = {
					which = ducat_cost
					value = 0.5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

			}

				which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_diplo_current
				value = 0
			}

				which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				value = 0

				which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				value = 0

				value = 0

				which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step

				value = 0

				which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_milit_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_milit_cost_divison
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_milit_current
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = ducat_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = admin_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_more
		}
		highlight = yes
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.0082
	title = POP_MassBuilding.008.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.008.desc
	picture = FARMING_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_adm_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_dip_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_mil_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_ducat_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_estate_cost_desc
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_manpower_cost_desc
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_more_canal
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_build_more_desc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_percentage

				}

					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult

				}

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost

				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}

					which = adm_power

					value = 0.25

					value = 0.05

					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure

				multiply_variable = {

					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {

				}

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

					}

				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}

					set_variable = {

					}

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}

				multiply_variable = {

				}

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}

					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage

					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0081
			}
		}

						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost

				}

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0081
			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.d"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 0.001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}

					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05

					value = 0.75
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}

					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}

					value = 1000
				}

					value = 1
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}

					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share

				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult

					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}

					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost

				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor

					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}

					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio

				}

					}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.e"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_estate_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			change_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 1
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0

					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {

					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power

					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}

					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio

				}

						}
					}

				}

					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}

				}

					value = -1
				}

					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount

				id = POP_MassBuilding.0081

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0081
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.h"
		trigger = {
			check_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 0.001
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				value = 0
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0

					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}

					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage

				}

					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}

					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio

					}
				}

					value = manpower
				}

				}
				divide_variable = {

				}

					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}

					}

				}

				}
				set_variable = {

				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {
					limit = {

					}

					}

					}

				}
				divide_variable = {

				set_variable = {

					limit = {

							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_percentage
					value = 100
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.0081
			}
		}
