	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.k"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				check_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = {
				which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				which = mass_build_max_manpower_expenditure
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost_discounted
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_cash_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_percentage
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					value = 0.25
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					value = 0.50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					value = 0.75
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					which = mass_build_admin_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 0.03
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					which = estate_bureaucracy_weight_share
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
					value = -1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					which = mass_build_diplo_mult
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 0.001
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
					value = 50
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_ducat_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					which = upper_pop
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
					value = 1
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					which = mass_build_milit_cost_divisor
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 0.01
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
					value = 1000
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = trigger_value:adm_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = adm_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_current
					which = adm_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_admin_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_admin_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_admin_max_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_greater_nobles_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_burghers_treasury
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
					which = estate_lesser_nobles_treasury
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_treasury
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_estate_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = trigger_value:dip_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = dip_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
					which = dip_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_diplo_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_diplo_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_estate_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_estate_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_estate_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_diplo_ratio
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
					value = manpower
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_manpower_cost
				}
				export_to_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = trigger_value:mil_power
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mil_power
					value = 1
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_milit_current
					which = mil_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_milit_current
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					which = mass_build_max_milit_cost
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
					which = mass_build_current_manpower_ratio
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_ratio
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
							which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mass_build_manpower_max_spend_ratio
						which = mass_build_current_milit_ratio
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
					which = mass_build_admin_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
					which = mass_build_estate_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expenditure
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
					which = mass_build_manpower_expediture_step
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_admin_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_estate_ratio
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
					which = mass_build_spending_manpower_ratio
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					which = mass_build_current_discount_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					value = -1
				}
				if = {

						}
					}

						}
					}
					set_variable = {

						}
					}

						which = mass_build_remaining_possible_discount
					}
				}

					which = mass_build_max_admin_expenditure
					which = mass_build_admin_max_spend_ratio
				}

					which = diplo_cost
					value = 512
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = diplo_cost
						value = 256
					}
				}
				add_dip_power = -256
				subtract_variable = {
					which = diplo_cost
					value = 256
				}
			}
			if = {

					}

				add_dip_power = -128

					}

				add_dip_power = -64
				subtract_variable = {

					}

				subtract_variable = {

				add_dip_power = -16

						value = 4
					}
				}
				add_dip_power = -4
				subtract_variable = {
					which = diplo_cost
					value = 4
				}

						value = 2
					}
				}
				add_dip_power = -2

					value = 2
				}

						which = diplo_cost
						value = 1
					}
				}
				add_dip_power = -1
				subtract_variable = {

					value = 1
				}

				which = diplo_cost
				value = 0
			}

					check_variable = {

						value = 2
					}

						value = 1
					}

				add_mil_power = -1

				}

				value = 0

						which = manpower_cost
						value = 256
					}
				}
				add_manpower = -256
				subtract_variable = {
					which = manpower_cost
					value = 256
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = manpower_cost
						value = 128
					}
				}
				add_manpower = -128
				subtract_variable = {
					which = manpower_cost
					value = 128
				}

			if = {

					check_variable = {

					}
				}
				add_manpower = -64
				subtract_variable = {

			if = {

					value = 1
				}

				which = manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}

				limit = {
					has_province_flag = mass_building_canal
				}
				province_event = {
					id = POP_MassBuilding.009
				}
				clr_province_flag = mass_building_canal
			}

				value = 0

				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_owned_province = {
							has_building = upgrade_canal_build
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
							}
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = mass_building_canal
							}
						}
					}
				}
				clr_country_flag = mass_build_more_canal
			}
		}
		highlight = yes
	}

		name = "POP_MassBuilding.002.z"
		hidden_effect = {

			}
			set_variable = {
				which = diplo_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = milit_cost
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = manpower_cost
				value = 0
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_more
		}
		highlight = yes
	}
}
province_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.009
	title = POP_MassBuilding.009.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.009.desc
	picture = ROAD_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = canal_level_2
				}
				set_province_flag = canal_level_3_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = canal_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_building = canal_level_1
				}
				set_province_flag = canal_level_2_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = canal_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_building = canal_level_1
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = canal_level_2
					}
					NOT = {
						has_building = canal_level_3
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = canal_level_1_building
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = canal_is_building
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			province_event = {
				id = POP_dev_button_interactions.410
				days = 1825
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.009.a"
		hidden_effect = {}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.900
	title = POP_MassBuilding.900.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.900.desc
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				}
				custom_tooltip = mass_build_flagging_road_tooltip
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
				custom_tooltip = mass_build_flagging_canal_tooltip
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
				custom_tooltip = mass_build_flagging_fort_tooltip
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_building_flagging_nothing_tooltip
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.901
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.b"
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.901
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.c"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.901
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.d"
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.901
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.e"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.901
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.f"
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.901
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.g"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = road_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 4
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = paved_road_network
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 13
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = paved_road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = paved_road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 33
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = highway_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = highway_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 50
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_roads_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 5
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_2
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_1
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_1
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 16
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_2
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_2
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 40
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_3
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_canal_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_17th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 41
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_16th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 35
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_17th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_15th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 26
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_16th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_14th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 15
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_15th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 3
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_15th
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_14th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_fort_build
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_all_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.h"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
						}
						OR = {
							has_building = road_network
							has_building = paved_road_network
							has_building = highway_network
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = road_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 4
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = paved_road_network
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 13
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = paved_road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = paved_road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 33
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = highway_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = highway_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 50
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_roads_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
						}
						OR = {
							has_building = canal_level_1
							has_building = canal_level_2
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 5
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_2
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_1
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_1
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 16
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_2
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_2
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 40
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_3
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_canal_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
						}
						OR = {
							has_building = fort_14th
							has_building = fort_15th
							has_building = fort_16th
							has_building = fort_17th
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_17th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 41
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_16th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 35
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_17th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_15th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 26
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_16th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_14th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 15
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_15th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 3
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_15th
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_14th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_fort_build
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_upgrade_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.z"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_MassBuilding.901
	title = POP_MassBuilding.900.title
	desc = POP_MassBuilding.900.desc
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				}
				custom_tooltip = mass_build_flagging_road_tooltip
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
				custom_tooltip = mass_build_flagging_canal_tooltip
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
				}
				custom_tooltip = mass_build_flagging_fort_tooltip
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
					has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = mass_building_flagging_nothing_tooltip
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_building
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.a"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.900
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.b"
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.900
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.c"
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.900
			}
		}

	option = {

	option = {

		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road

		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort

				id = POP_MassBuilding.900

		}

	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.f"

			has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			country_event = {
				id = POP_MassBuilding.900
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.g"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = road_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 4
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = paved_road_network
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 13
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = paved_road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = paved_road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 33
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = highway_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = highway_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 50
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_roads_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 5
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_2
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_1
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_1
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 16
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_2
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_2
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 40
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_3
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_canal_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_17th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 41
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_16th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 35
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_17th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_15th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 26
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_16th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_14th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 15
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_15th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 3
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_15th
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_14th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_fort_build
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_all_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.h"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
				has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
						}
						OR = {
							has_building = road_network
							has_building = paved_road_network
							has_building = highway_network
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = road_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 4
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = paved_road_network
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 13
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = highway_network
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = paved_road_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = paved_road_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 33
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = road_and_rail_network
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = highway_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = highway_network
									owner = {
										dip_tech = 50
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = road_and_rail_network
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = road_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_roads_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
						}
						OR = {
							has_building = canal_level_1
							has_building = canal_level_2
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 5
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_2
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_1
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_1
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 16
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = canal_level_3
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_2
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = canal_level_2
									owner = {
										adm_tech = 40
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = canal_is_building
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = canal_level_3
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_canal_build
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						owner = {
							has_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
						}
						OR = {
							has_building = fort_14th
							has_building = fort_15th
							has_building = fort_16th
							has_building = fort_17th
						}
						AND = {
							is_city = yes
							NOT = {
								has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
							}
							OR = {
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_17th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 41
									}
									AND = {
										always = yes
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_18th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_16th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 35
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_17th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_15th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 26
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_16th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									has_building = fort_14th
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 15
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_15th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
								AND = {
									owner = {
										mil_tech = 3
									}
									AND = {
										NOT = {
											has_building = fort_15th
											has_building = fort_16th
											has_building = fort_17th
											has_building = fort_18th
										}
									}
									NOT = {
										has_building = fort_14th
									}
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = fort_is_building
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					add_building = upgrade_fort_build
				}
			}
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
		custom_tooltip = mass_build_upgrade_tooltip
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_MassBuilding.900.z"
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {}
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = mass_building
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_road
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_canal
			clr_country_flag = mass_build_flagging_fort
		}
	}
}
